contractMetadata.name: Artchain Circle Memberships
contractMetadata.description:
The Artchain Circle is a unique opportunity for collectors, investors and art enthusiasts to be able to represent their own creative voice in the future of this exclusive membership. The Circle entitles you to a number of benefits including invitations to red carpet Artshow Events, unique art experiences, pre-sale advantages, limited editons of Art/NFTs, get to know the artist
behind the paintings, and meet other art lovers who share your cultural passion. You will also receive the Artchain Circle Member tokens (ARTCM) which will allow you to shape the future of the Artchain Circle and profit from future crypto opportunities. You will enjoy many more opportunities as the Circle is evolving.
